live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.

Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will be fixed tomorrow.  We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
37704.summary: Some customers in the Kennedale Industrial and Station Pointe area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37704.title: May 25 - Edmonton (Kennedale Industrial and Station Pointe) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
